ingredients.item: ½x300g pack Blue Dragon Wholewheat Noodles

instructions.step: Dice the avocado and mix in a bowl with the chilli sauce. Bring the stock to the boil in a pan with the shallots. Simmer and stir in the curry paste.

Add the noodles, pushing them down into the stock to soften for a couple of minutes. Add the prawns, mangetout and half the coriander, and cook gently for 5 minutes, stirring frequently until the prawns are pink and cooked through.
Pile into shallow bowls, pouring over the stock left in the pan. Top with the avocado, sprinkle with the remaining coriander and serve with lime wedges, if liked.
